title: Instanced 3D Model Feature Table
description: A set of Instanced 3D Model semantics that contains values defining the position and appearance properties for instanced models in a tile.

POSITION.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

POSITION_QUANTIZED.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

NORMAL_UP.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

NORMAL_RIGHT.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

NORMAL_UP_OCT32P.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

NORMAL_RIGHT_OCT32P.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

SCALE.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

SCALE_NON_UNIFORM.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

BATCH_ID.description: A `BinaryBodyReference` object defining the reference to a section of the binary body where the property values are stored. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

INSTANCES_LENGTH.description: A `GlobalPropertyInteger` object defining an integer property for all features. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

RTC_CENTER.description: A `GlobalPropertyCartesian3` object defining a 3-component numeric property for all features. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

QUANTIZED_VOLUME_OFFSET.description: A `GlobalPropertyCartesian3` object defining a 3-component numeric property for all features. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

QUANTIZED_VOLUME_SCALE.description: A `GlobalPropertyCartesian3` object defining a 3-component numeric property for all features. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).

EAST_NORTH_UP.description: A `GlobalPropertyBoolean` object defining a boolean property for all features. See the corresponding property semantic in [Semantics](/specification/TileFormats/Instanced3DModel/README.md#semantics).
